content: व्युत्पद् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To be produced from, originate in. {@--2@} To be derived from (a root &c.). {@--3@} To become proficient in or conversant with. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To produce, cause. {@--2@} To derive, trace to a root (as a word); ब्रह्मशब्दस्य व्युत्पाद्यमानस्य <ls>Ś. B.</ls>
